Dialogue.content: Hi! I'm Sophia Wang. This is my first time here.
Hello, Sophia! It's great to meet you. How can I assist you today?
I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my graphic design class.
I'm sorry to hear that. What's been particularly frustrating for you?
We have a group project on mental health awareness, and one of my teammates, Liam, seems really disengaged.
That sounds challenging. Have you had a chance to reach out to Liam about how you're feeling?
Hi again. Things have gotten a bit more complicated.
Welcome back, Sophia! What's been going on?
I tried to take the lead by presenting my ideas in the last meeting, but everyone seemed indifferent and unresponsive, especially Liam.
That must be discouraging. How did that make you feel?
It made me anxious about my ability to lead the group. I doubt my capacity to motivate my teammates.
Those feelings are completely valid. Leadership can be tough, especially when you want to inspire others. Have you considered how you might try to engage your team again?
Hi. I'm feeling very burnt out right now.
Hi Sophia. I'm here to help. What's contributing to your burnout?
With the project deadline nearing, I've taken on most of the work, hoping to compensate for Liam and others. My presentation rehearsal went poorly, and I felt embarrassed afterward.
It sounds incredibly overwhelming, especially when you've put in so much effort. Have you reached out to anyone in your group for help or support?
No, I don't want to add to their stress. I feel so isolated right now.
I finally opened up to my family about the group project, and they encouraged me to talk to my teammates.
I'm glad to hear that, Sophia! How did it feel sharing your struggles with your family?
It felt relieving, but I'm still unsure about how to approach my team. I want to communicate honestly but without causing more tension.
That's a thoughtful approach. Remember, open communication can help foster understanding. What do you think you'll say to them?
I want to express my feelings but I'm not sure how to frame it.
Perhaps you could write down your thoughts. It might help organize what you want to communicate. You can do this, I believe in you!
